Pre-Game Insights: Colombia are the dark horses at Copa America 2024
Paraguay have not beaten Los Cafeteros since 2017
Colombia possess one of the most intriguing squads at Copa America
James Rodriguez and co. are still expected to advance to the quarter-finals
Colombia's recent form would make them the favorites of almost any other Copa America group
Miscellaneous Highlights: Colombia vs Paraguay is the first Group D fixture of Copa America 2024
The chemistry between James, Arias, and Diaz is too much for Paraguay to deal with
Colombia defeated Paraguay 1-0 when the two sides met back in November
Others: Colombia look to extend their 23-game unbeaten run as Los Cafeteros take on Paraguay at Copa America 2024
Paraguay have recently performed well at the Copa America, only losing back-to-back quarter-finals in penalty shootouts
Colombia possess one of the most intriguing squads at Copa America, including Liverpool's Luis Diaz and Fluminense's Jhon Arias
Colombia's recent form would make them the favorites of almost any other Copa America group, but the 2019 champions, Brazil, are also in Group D
